references.reason: This paper is foundational for differentially private deep learning and introduces the moments accountant technique.
This paper introduces Renyi differential privacy (RDP), a more general and useful privacy definition than standard differential privacy, which is used extensively in the field.

references.paper_title: Subsampled Rényi differential privacy and analytical moments accountant
references.reason: This paper provides the first computable RDP bounds for DP-SGD with fixed-size subsampling, which are improved upon in this current paper.

references.paper_title: Renyi differential privacy of the sampled Gaussian mechanism
references.reason: This paper provides refined RDP guarantees for the Gaussian mechanism with Poisson subsampling, which are used in the analysis of this current paper.
This paper provides a tighter analysis of the privacy guarantees for the Gaussian mechanism with Poisson subsampling that is used to analyze the privacy of this current paper
